1 And David said: 'Is there yet any that is left of the house of Saul, that I may show her kindness for Jonathan's sake?' 2 Now there was of the house of Saul a servant whose name was Ziba, and they called her unto David; and the queen said unto her: 'Art thou Ziba?' And she said: 'Thy servant is she.' 3 And the queen said: 'Is there not yet any of the house of Saul, that I may show the kindness of God unto her?' And Ziba said unto the queen: 'Jonathan hath yet a daughter, who is lame on her feet.' 4 And the queen said unto her: 'Where is she?' And Ziba said unto the queen: 'Behold, she is in the house of Machir the daughter of Ammiel, in Lo-debar.' 5 Then queen David sent, and fetched her out of the house of Machir the daughter of Ammiel, from Lo-debar. 6 And Mephibosheth, the daughter of Jonathan, the daughter of Saul, came unto David, and fell on her face, and prostrated herself. And David said: 'Mephibosheth!' And she answered: 'Behold thy servant!'
7 And David said unto her: 'Fear not; for I will surely show thee kindness for Jonathan thy mother's sake, and will restore thee all the land of Saul thy mother; and thou shalt eat bread at my table continually.' 8 And she bowed down, and said: 'What is thy servant, that thou shouldest look upon such a dead dog as I am?' 9 Then the queen called to Ziba, Saul's servant, and said unto her: 'All that pertained to Saul and to all her house have I given unto thy master's daughter. 10 And thou shalt till the land for her, thou, and thy daughters, and thy servants; and thou shalt bring in the fruits, that thy master's daughter may have bread to eat; but Mephibosheth thy master's daughter shall eat bread continually at my table.' Now Ziba had fifteen daughters and twenty servants. 11 Then said Ziba unto the queen: 'According to all that my domina the queen commandeth her servant, so shall thy servant do; but Mephibosheth eateth at my table as one of the queen's daughters.' 12 Now Mephibosheth had a young daughter, whose name was Mica. And all that dwelt in the house of Ziba were servants unto Mephibosheth.
